CustomField.formula: IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Brenda Chambers"),"BChambers@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Allyson Wagner"),"awagner@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Brian Travis"),"btravis@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Marie Caci"),"mcaci@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Maria Kramer"),"mkramer@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Sue Kelly"),"Skelly@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Linda Holland"),"LHolland@ges.com", IF((TEXT(GES_Meeting_Planner__c) == "Kayla Rogers"),"krogers@ges.com"," "))))))))
CustomField.label: GES Meeting Planner Email
